What we are looking for
You will be an evangelist for quality assurance internally and with clients, keeping up to date with QA best practice and innovation. You will have a natural curiosity, explorative nature, pragmatic approach, and an urge to ‘break-things’. These qualities will lead you to resolve issues and, combined with strong technical knowledge and logic, help define the root cause.
We are looking for someone who has a mixture of manual and automated test experience and is happy to-do both within the role. You will need to have strong communication skills, both written and verbal, and be able to work well within a team.
Required skills & experience:
Proficient in English, written and verbal.
4 years ‘hands on’ QA industry experience.
Experience testing complex, enterprise level CMS builds, bespoke web applications, APIs and Native apps as well as more simple quick turn-around projects.
High level understanding of systems architecture in order to triage and diagnose issues.
Ability to read and understand errors messages, stack traces and logs.
An understanding of BDD, and how to use it as a framework.
Willingness to explore and understand complex systems, find bugs and not necessarily follow a script/plan.
Test case management tools such as XRay.
Ability to write test scripts and create test data.
Demonstrable knowledge of automated testing using existing services, libraries and frameworks.
Ability to test APIs using tools like Postman.
Experience of working in a fast, agile environment.
Exposure to agile and waterfall delivery methods.
Experience working within JIRA and Confluence.
A desire to be part of the Tangent family and grow with us.
